main event: On January 23, 1967, a witness reported seeing a circular reddish-orange object in the sky over Cuyahoga Falls, Ohio.
interesting points: The object was visible for 15 minutes and changed color during the sighting., The witness felt that the object was unlike any known aircraft or celestial object., The report matches findings from Project Blue Book dates concerning sightings in similar areas., The witness was 15 years old and reported the sighting to local police shortly after seeing it., There was no physical evidence found regarding the sighting.
witness description: A 15-year-old male who claimed to be familiar with normal aircraft and celestial objects.
